text: Rūze, ki Alloh hamai munofiqonro az qaʙrhojaşon zinda mekunad, pas hamcunon ki dar dunjo ʙaroi şumo qasam mexūrdand, ʙaroi Ū ham qasam xohand xūrd, ki mū'minand. Va mepindorand, ki in qasam dar nazdi Alloh foidaaşon medihad, cunone, ki dar dunjo nazdi mū'minon foidaaşon medod. Ogoh ʙoşed, ki haroina, onho xele durūƣgūjonand
